div.div: The latest Hurricane Sandy information. Stay safe!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Pemeev&via=Digg&text=Here Comes The Hurricane

div.div: Cameras caught what appears to be multiple explosions as Hurricane Sandy hits New York City.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PhLuR1&via=Digg&text=Hurricane Explosion Caught On Film

div.a: The Sad And Artificial World Of Zoo Habitats

div.div: Zoos are inherently bizarre. The sheer thrill of seeing strange and exotic beasts is often tempered by the reality of the strange and artificial environments they’re kept in, raising the question: Can they really be happy hanging out in those habitats?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SdH665&via=Digg&text=The Sad And Artificial World Of Zoo Habitats

div.a: Could Sandy Be Instagram’s Big Citizen Journalism Moment?

div.div: Hurricane Sandy could be Instagram’s big citizen journalism moment. The time when the seemingly frivolous app could get some Arab Spring-style gravitas.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SUNVqO&via=Digg&text=Could Sandy Be Instagram’s Big Citizen Journalism Moment?

div.a: Apple Just Blew Up Their Management Team: iOS VP And Head Of Retail Out

div.div: Apple has just announced a major shake-up: Senior VP of iOS software Scott Forstall is leaving Apple along with Head of Retail John Browett. As a result, the remaining executive team is shifting responsibilities.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Ub9Uc9&via=Digg&text=Apple Just Blew Up Their Management Team: iOS VP And Head Of Retail Out

div.a: Why Iran Wants To Attack The United States

div.div: The Islamic Republic's terror plots may look bumbling today, but what about tomorrow?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V0tvB4&via=Digg&text=Why Iran Wants To Attack The United States

div.div: An exclusive, behind-the-scenes look at the US bid to build a radical new machine, capable of solving some of the most complex questions in science today. Its secret: video game technology.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S6NAjy&via=Digg&text=Building Titan: The 'World's Fastest' Supercomputer

div.a: How Do Large Ships Deal With Massive Hurricanes?

div.div: As Hurricane Sandy barrels up the coast, many in the United States hope the storm veers right and heads “safely out to sea”, but for a few people, there is nothing safe about this possibility.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YeVHiu&via=Digg&text=How Do Large Ships Deal With Massive Hurricanes?

div.a: Incorrectly Captioned 'Hurricane Sandy' Photo Goes Viral

div.div: Unfortunately for those who pounced on the story, that’s not Hurricane Sandy seen in the photo.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SsMaCN&via=Digg&text=Incorrectly Captioned 'Hurricane Sandy' Photo Goes Viral

div.a: The Dirty Secret Of The Global Hair Trade

div.div: If there's one business in Britain that's bouncy, it's hair extensions – sales are up to £60m a year and growing. But underneath all that hair there's a global tale of exploitation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VVfUfP&via=Digg&text=The Dirty Secret Of The Global Hair Trade

div.a: A Field Guide To Hurricane Photography

div.div: "The taxonomist in me can’t help but notice that photographs of Hurricane Sandy, now bearing down on the Atlantic coast, fall into distinct categories."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S8MgxF&via=Digg&text=A Field Guide To Hurricane Photography

div.div: You might have seen past “banned” Apple promo videos from John Elerick and crew on YouTube. The guys are out with their latest spoof Apple commercial today, but this time it is for the iPad mini.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WV7zYH&via=Digg&text=The 'Banned' iPad Mini Commercial

div.a: Hurricane Coverage Cliches In GIF Form

div.div: Are you ready for Sandy, East Coasters? Are you stocked up with water, toilet paper, batteries and trail mix? There’s one more necessity no one in Sandy’s path should be without, GIFs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Snt95C&via=Digg&text=Hurricane Coverage Cliches In GIF Form

div.a: How Much Did It Cost YouTube To Stream Gangnam Style?

div.div: This is actually a surprisingly complex calculation.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PCGZ4O&via=Digg&text=How Much Did It Cost YouTube To Stream Gangnam Style?

div.div: JUST DON'T DRINK DIET COKE THROUGH AN IV

div.a: How Much Caffeine Would It Take To Kill You?

div.div: A lawsuit over the death of a 14-year-old girl raises new questions about how much caffeine is too much--and what other nefarious factors might come into play.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VYygMT&via=Digg&text=How Much Caffeine Would It Take To Kill You?

div.a: Google Earth Finds More Strange Patterns In The Chinese Desert

div.div: Google Earth reveals an 8 km line of artificial grid-like structures in the Chinese desert. Now one researcher says she know why it's there

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YdNZFf&via=Digg&text=Google Earth Finds More Strange Patterns In The Chinese Desert

div.a: Nine Ways To Make Your Cell Phone Last The Whole Storm Even If The Power Goes Out

div.div: How to make sure you can stay connected through the one device that can summon emergency services and let you know when it’s safe to come out, even days after you’ve lost power.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S8wbrg&via=Digg&text=Nine Ways To Make Your Cell Phone Last The Whole Storm Even If The Power Goes Out

div.a: Creepiest App Ever Finds All Your Friends' Bikini Pics

div.div: Want to find the most scandalous photos your friends have ever posted but just don't have enough time to creep on Facebook yourself? Try letting this new app do the work for you!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q0BHjG&via=Digg&text=Creepiest App Ever Finds All Your Friends' Bikini Pics

div.a: Don't Worry, Everyone, The Apple Stores Are Safe

div.div: Everyone seems very concerned with the status of the Apple store locations in New York, Philadelphia, and Washington D.C. Enough with the iBags jokes, people.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RrSTeE&via=Digg&text=Don't Worry, Everyone, The Apple Stores Are Safe

div.div: INSTEAD OF LOOKING OUT THE WINDOW

div.a: The Best Places To See the Storm Online

div.div: As the iPhone-ed masses witness Hurricane Sandy's wrath, the web is full of user-generated storm porn.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yeg0g2&via=Digg&text=The Best Places To See the Storm Online

div.a: Truth, Lies, And 'Doxxing': The Real Moral Of The Gawker/Reddit Story

div.div: What are the moral and ethical costs of outing people and focusing unwanted attention on them?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PBXZbo&via=Digg&text=Truth, Lies, And 'Doxxing': The Real Moral Of The Gawker/Reddit Story

div.div: These are the simplest brands in the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U9JyXT&via=Digg&text=The World's 10 Simplest Brands

div.a: The Smart Lightbulb Comes To Apple Stores

div.div: Philips has set its sights on disrupting the home automation market, today launching its new “Hue” smart light bulbs, which are to be sold exclusively in Apple Stores.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YdF7Q7&via=Digg&text=The Smart Lightbulb Comes To Apple Stores

div.a: Ship Used In 'Pirates Of The Caribbean' Abandoned Amid Sandy

div.div: Seventeen people aboard HMS Bounty have abandoned ship off the coast of North Carolina amid Hurricane Sandy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S7Wr4U&via=Digg&text=Ship Used In 'Pirates Of The Caribbean' Abandoned Amid Sandy

div.div: GOOD LUCK SELLING YOUR USED iPHONE

div.a: How A Supreme Court Ruling May Stop You From Reselling Just About Anything

div.div: Wiley v. Kirtsaeng may be the IP case of the decade—affecting all from eBay to libraries.
